dmca.title: NetEnforcers on the prowl for Trademark Logos and Copyrighted Images
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern,  

This is in regards to the email which was sent on October 16, 2007. I have not heard anything back about the Cease and Desist letter sent to your company on behalf of our client, Toshiba. We are showing your client, www.bhphotovideo.com has yet to comply and has not made any attempts to contact us about this issue. In order to comply your client would need to remove all trademarked logos and/or copyrighted images/text. Please provide me with a follow-up on this issue by October 26, 2007. I will assume that if no response is received, you as the hosting company are choosing not to comply by not taking action against this website. In addition, our client will be made aware of this decision. If you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact me via email at [private]@netenforcers.com. 
 

All URLs are Trademarked Logo Violations 

http://www.bhphotovideo.com/c/product/496658-REG/Toshiba_52LX177_52_CINEMA_1080p_LCD.html           

http://www.bhphotovideo.com/c/product/463524-REG/Toshiba_HD_A2_HD_A2_HD_DVD_Player.html
